title: An Example Program Using Structs
description: In this lab, we will write a program using structs to calculate the area of a rectangle, refactoring the initial code that used separate variables for width and height.

meta.description: Learn how to use structs to calculate the area of a rectangle in Rust programming.
meta.keywords: rectangle, rust playground, area calculation, rust tutor, rust online compiler, rust commands, structs, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online
